english.segment1: The sweetened whisper that I know. Comes to me when I have a restless heart. Fainter than a passing glance yet stops me where I stand. Waiting for just one more look from you
english.segment2: Your love is not like mine
english.segment3: Turn me around. Show me how to love profoundly. I want everything you are, everything you are. Turn me around. Even when I cannot see. I want everything you are, everything you are
english.segment4: The deepest longing that I know. Comes to me when I am awaiting you. No greater love could you have shown and who could know the cost. How far you go to seek and save the lost
english.segment5: Your love is not like mine
english.segment6: Turn me around. Show me how to love profoundly. I want everything you are, everything you are. Turn me around. Even when I cannot see. I want everything you are, everything you are
english.segment7: I only want to see your face.
